reasoning: The original query seeks to understand how control theory is applied in radar tracking, particularly in the context of developing "cognitive" radar systems. The existing results primarily cover the historical development and basic principles of radar technology without delving into the specific application of control theory for cognitive functions.
query_goals: Understand control theory applications in radar tracking
Explore algorithms and methodologies used for implementing control strategies in radar
Identify research on cognitive radar and its relation to control theory
augmented_query: adaptive control  optimal control Kalman filter Bayesian estimation model predictive control radar target tracking
query: Control theoretic approach to tracking radar: First step towards cognition
